articles.title: Video: See heart-breaking interview with child who survived Uvalde shooting - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Shimon Prokupecz speaks with one of the children who survived Uvalde, Texas, school shooting, and the mothers of several children who survived the massacre.

articles.title: Watch: Uvalde parents react to surveillance video of school shooting - CNN Video
articles.description: Parents of victims killed in the Robb Elementary School shooting reacted angrily to new surveillance video from the day of the shooting obtained by the Austin American-Statesman newspaper which was published before they could see it.

articles.author: Elizabeth Joseph and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Uvalde City Council accepts Pete Arredondo's resignation
articles.description: The Uvalde, Texas, City Council on Tuesday accepted the resignation of Councilman Pedro "Pete" Arredondo.

articles.title: Video: Ivanka's former chief of staff contradicts reason why Ivanka was at the Jan. 6 rally - CNN Video
articles.description: The House select committee investigating the Capitol insurrection presents contradicting video testimony from Ivanka Trump and her former chief of staff, Julie Radford, during their seventh hearing.

articles.author: By Pete Muntean, CNN
articles.title: East Coast thunderstorms disrupt hundreds of US flights
articles.description: Airlines and passengers are having the worst day for flight cancellations in a week on Tuesday because of thunderstorms bearing down on East Coast hubs.
articles.content:
(CNN) Airlines and passengers are having the worst day for flight cancellations in a week because of thunderstorms bearing down on East Coast hubs.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: The 2024 Republican race is no longer a slam dunk for Donald Trump
articles.description: For the better part of the last year, when people asked me whether I thought Donald Trump would be the Republican presidential nominee in 2024, the answer has been the same: If he runs, he will be.

articles.author: By Elise Hammond, Amir Vera, Maureen Chowdhury and Meg Wagner, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Surveillance video from Uvalde shooting
articles.description: Newly published surveillance video show police running away from gunfire inside Robb Elementary in Uvalde, Texas, during the May shooting that killed 21 people. Follow here for live updates.

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: Starbucks to close 16 stores citing personal  safety concerns
articles.description: Starbucks is planning to close 16 locations across various cities, citing safety concerns.

articles.author: Alex Rogers, Katelyn Polantz, Evan Perez, Tierney Sneed
articles.title: Liz Cheney: Committee informed DOJ that Trump attempted to contact a witness not yet seen in the hearings
articles.description: Rep. Liz Cheney, the vice chairwoman of the House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, insurrection, said at the panel's hearing Tuesday that former President Donald Trump attempted to contact a witness who has not yet been publicly identified.

articles.title: Austin newspaper posts portions of video from Uvalde school shooting hallway ahead of official release
articles.description: The Austin American-Statesman newspaper published Tuesday edited portions of school surveillance video showing officers retreating from gunfire in the hallway of Robb Elementary in Uvalde, Texas, during the fatal shooting May 24.
